name: Hasty Hues 3D
description:
Dive through a maze of blocks and spikes, as you quickly switch between primary colors to match the blocks below in this 3D re-master of Hasty Hues. Pick up Speed Clocks and fly into Invincibility Portals to conquer many stages. Directional blocks will change your your movement path.

How to play:
1. The ball color changes automatically from blue to yellow to red and back.
2. Tap on the screen to dive downward in the level. The color remains the same until it hits the block or object below it.
3. When Invincible, the ball turns green and you can break all colors.
